channel.title: How to Get Armor on Halo 3
channel.description: An awesome new feature of Halo 3 are the new armors available as unlockables in the game. In this guide, I will teach you how to get Halo 3 armor. How to get the Mark IV Armor in Halo 3: Mark IV Head - Available from the start. Mark IV Shoulders - Available from the start. Mark IV Body - Available from the start. How to get the CQB Armor in Halo 3: CQB Head - Available from the start. CQB Shoulders - Available from the start. CQB Body - Available from the start.

item.title: How to Get Armor on Halo 3
item.dc:creator: JamesKane
item.source: How to Get Armor on Halo 3

item.title: How to Get Armor on Halo 3
item.dc:creator: heutenitaz
item.description:
An awesome new feature of Halo 3 are the new armors available as unlockables in the game. In this guide, I will teach you how to get Halo 3 armor.
How to get the Mark IV Armor in Halo 3:
Mark IV Head - Available from the start.
Mark IV Shoulders - Available from the start.
Mark IV Body - Available from the start.
How to get the CQB Armor in Halo 3:
CQB Head - Available from the start.
CQB Shoulders - Available from the start.
CQB Body - Available from the start.
